search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Egnyte (egnyte.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Egnyte can be found at: [https://www.egnyte.com/plans-pricing](https://www.egnyte.com/plans-pricing)【3:0†source】.

COLLABORATION






Mobile Apps (iOS and Android)

External User Accounts

Mobile Apps (iOS and Android)
Provide user types administrative roles for assigning access and sharing permissions



External User Accounts
Securely share links, not files and allow external users to upload files to a specified folder



Email-Validated Sharing
Allow recipient to view (but not download) files and/or folders



Watermarking
Part of Enhanced Sharing Controls, automatically watermark sensitive documents upon delivery



Standard Workflows
Part of Enhanced Sharing Controls, send encrypted files to a MAC or PC endpoint using FileGuard



Advanced Workflows (e.g. Multistep)
Protect sensitive data by automating safeguards for sharing regulated and sensitive data




INTELLIGENCE






AI Copilot
Search in files for specific text $ $ $
AI Search
Ask questions about a document in preview pane and receive answers synthesized by large language models (LLMs) $ $ $
AI Workflows
Find documents and folders faster by searching with custom metadata $ $ $

AI Copilot
Search in files for specific text $ $ $
AI Search

AI Workflows
Find documents and folders faster by searching with custom metadata $ $ $

GOVERNANCE






Contain Lifecycle (Retain, Archive, Delete) Policies
Manually restore an older file version



Suspicious Login Issue Detection
Automatically lock files to prevent collaborators from overwriting changes



Probable Ransomware Detection (artifact-based)
Create templates to organize repeatable content and reduce project start-up time



Sensitive Data Discovery and Classification
Attach metadata to files for search granularity



Auto-Remediation
Attach metadata to files for search granularity
